verses.verse: וַנֵּ֣פֶן <WH6437> van-Ne-fen Then we turned וַנַּ֔עַל <WH5927> van-Na-'al, and went up דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan; to Bashan וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out עוֹג֩ <WH5747> 'Og and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֜נוּ <WH7125> lik-ra-Te-nu against ה֧וּא <WH1931> hu he וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo us he and all his people לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> 'ed-Re-'i. at Edrei

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> ti-Ra unto me Fear אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki into בְיָדְךָ֞ <WH3027> ve-ya-de-Cha into thy hand נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti him not for I will deliver אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo him and all his people וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> ar-Tzo; and his land וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta and thou shalt do לּ֔וֹ lo, כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who עָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta, unto him as thou didst לְסִיחֹן֙ <WH5511> le-si-Chon unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <WH2809> be-chesh-Bon. at Heshbon

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh So the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God בְּיָדֵ֗נוּ <WH3027> be-ya-De-nu, into our hands גַּ֛ם <WH1571> gam also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ע֥וֹג <WH5747> og Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- also the king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; and all his people וַנַּכֵּ֕הוּ <WH5221> van-nak-Ke-hu and we smote עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> bil-Ti no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> hish-'ir- him until none was left ל֖וֹ lo שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8300> sa-Rid. to him remaining

וַנִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> van-nil-Kod And we took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עָרָיו֙ <WH5892> 'a-Rav all his cities בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv, he לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah become קִרְיָ֔ה <WH7151> kir-Yah, there was not a city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not לָקַ֖חְנוּ <WH3947> la-Kach-nu which we took מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <WH853> me-'it-Tam; שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim not from them threescore עִיר֙ <WH5892> 'ir cities כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> Che-vel all the region אַרְגֹּ֔ב <WH709> ar-Go, of Argob מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <WH4467> mam-Le-chet the kingdom ע֖וֹג <WH5747> og of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> bab-ba-Shan. in Bashan

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these עָרִ֧ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim All these cities בְּצֻר֛וֹת <WH1219> be-tzu-Rot [were] fenced חוֹמָ֥ה <WH2346> cho-Mah walls גְבֹהָ֖ה <WH1364> ge-vo-Hah with high דְּלָתַ֣יִם <WH1817> de-la-Ta-yim gates וּבְרִ֑יחַ <WH1280> u-ve-Ri-ach; and bars לְבַ֛ד <WH905> le-Vad alone מֵעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> me-'a-Rei towns הַפְּרָזִ֖י <WH6521> hap-pe-ra-Zi beside unwalled הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> har-Beh many מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. a great

וַנַּחֲרֵ֣ם <WH2763> van-na-cha-Rem And we utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher them עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <WH6213> 'a-Si-nu, them as we did לְסִיחֹ֖ן <WH5511> le-si-Chon unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> chesh-Bon; of Heshbon הַחֲרֵם֙ <WH2763> ha-cha-Rem utterly destroying כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of every עִ֣יר <WH5892> 'ir of every city מְתִ֔ם <WH4962> me-Tim, the men הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> han-na-Shim women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <WH2945> ve-hat-Taf. and children

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> hab-be-he-Mah But all the cattle וּשְׁלַ֥ל <WH7998> u-she-Lal and the spoil הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim of the cities בַּזּ֥וֹנוּ <WH962> baz-Zo-nu we took for a prey לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַנִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> van-nik-Kach out בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> ba-'Et at that time הַהִוא֙ <WH1931> ha-hi-V he אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land מִיַּ֗ד <WH3027> mi-Yad, of the hand שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> she-Nei of the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver that [was] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den; Jordan מִנַּ֥חַל <WH5158> min-Na-chal from the river אַרְנֹ֖ן <WH769> 'ar-Non of Arnon עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against הַ֥ר <WH2022> har unto mount חֶרְמֽוֹן׃ <WH2768> cher-Mon. Hermon

צִידֹנִ֛ים <WH6722> tzi-do-Nim the Sidonians יִקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> yik-re-'U call לְחֶרְמ֖וֹן <WH2768> le-cher-Mon ([Which] Hermon שִׂרְיֹ֑ן <WH8303> sir-Yon; Sirion וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ve-Ha-'e-mo-Ri, and the Amorites יִקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> yik-re-'u- call ל֖וֹ lo שְׂנִֽיר׃ <WH8149> se-Nir. Senir

כֹּ֣ל׀ <WH3605> kol all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei All the cities הַמִּישֹׁ֗ר <WH4334> ham-mi-Shor, of the plain וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad and all Gilead וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, and all Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far סַלְכָ֖ה <WH5548> sal-Chah unto Salchah וְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <WH154> ve-'ed-Re-'i; and Edrei עָרֵ֛י <WH5892> 'a-Rei cities מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <WH4467> mam-Le-chet of the kingdom ע֖וֹג <WH5747> og of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> bab-ba-Shan. in Bashan

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for רַק־ <WH7535> rak- but ע֞וֹג <WH5747> og For only Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֗ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan נִשְׁאַר֮ <WH7604> nish-'Ar remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <WH3499> mi-Ye-ter of the remnant הָרְפָאִים֒ <WH7497> ha-re-fa-'Im of giants הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עַרְשׂוֹ֙ <WH6210> ar-So behold his bedstead עֶ֣רֶשׂ <WH6210> 'E-res [was] a bedstead בַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> bar-Zel, of iron הֲלֹ֣ה <WH3808> ha-Loh [is] it not הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he בְּרַבַּ֖ת <WH7237> be-rab-Bat in Rabbath בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon; of Ammon תֵּ֧שַׁע <WH8672> Te-sha' was nine אַמּ֣וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits אָרְכָּ֗הּ <WH753> 'a-re-Kah, [was] the length וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' thereof and four אַמּ֛וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits רָחְבָּ֖הּ <WH7341> ra-che-Bah the breadth בְּאַמַּת־ <WH520> be-'am-mat- of it after the cubit אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. of a man

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz And this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> haz-Zot we יָרַ֖שְׁנוּ <WH3423> ya-Rash-nu [which] we possessed בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֑וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv; he מֵעֲרֹעֵ֞ר <WH6177> me-'a-ro-'Er from Aroer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is by נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal which [is] by the river אַרְנֹ֗ן <WH769> 'ar-Non, Arnon וַחֲצִ֤י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and half הַֽר־ <WH2022> har- mount הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad Gilead וְעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> ve-'a-Rav, and the cities נָתַ֕תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti thereof gave לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <WH7206> la-ru-'u-ve-Ni I unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִֽי׃ <WH1425> ve-lag-ga-Di. and to the Gadites

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> ve-Ye-ter And the rest הַגִּלְעָ֤ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad of Gilead וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַבָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan and all Bashan מַמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4467> mam-Le-chet [being] the kingdom ע֔וֹג <WH5747> og, of Og נָתַ֕תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti gave לַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> la-cha-Tzi I unto the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> ham-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> kol all חֶ֤בֶל <WH2256> Che-vel all the region הָֽאַרְגֹּב֙ <WH709> ha-'ar-Go of Argob לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, with all Bashan הַה֥וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu which יִקָּרֵ֖א <WH7121> yik-ka-Re was called אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> re-fa-'Im. of giants

יָאִ֣יר <WH2971> ya-'Ir Jair בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לָקַח֙ <WH3947> la-Kach took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> Che-vel all the country אַרְגֹּ֔ב <WH709> ar-Go, of Argob עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul unto the coasts הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <WH1651> hag-ge-shu-Ri of Geshuri וְהַמַּֽעֲכָתִ֑י <WH4602> ve-ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti; and Maachathi וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called אֹתָ֨ם <WH853> 'o-Tam עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- after שְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo them after his own name אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan Bashan חַוֹּ֣ת chav-Vot יָאִ֔יר <WH2334> ya-'Ir, Havvoth-jair עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this
וּלְמָכִ֖יר <WH4353> u-le-ma-Chir unto Machir נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti And I gave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad. Gilead

וְלָרֻאוּבֵנִ֨י <WH7206> ve-la-ru-'u-ve-Ni And unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֜י <WH1425> ve-lag-ga-Di and unto the Gadites נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti I gave מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad from Gilead וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal even unto the river אַרְנֹ֔ן <WH769> 'ar-Non, Arnon תּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> Toch half הַנַּ֖חַל <WH5158> han-Na-chal the valley וּגְבֻ֑ל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul; and the border וְעַד֙ <WH5704> ve-'Ad far יַבֹּ֣ק <WH2999> yab-Bok Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> han-Na-chal, even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> am-Mon. of Ammon

וְהָֽעֲרָבָ֖ה <WH6160> ve-ha-'a-ra-Vah The plain וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> ve-hai-yar-Den also and Jordan וּגְבֻ֑ל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul; and the coast מִכִּנֶּ֗רֶת <WH3672> mik-kin-Ne-ret, [thereof] from Chinnereth וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad far יָ֤ם <WH3220> yam even unto the sea הָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <WH6160> ha-'a-ra-Vah of the plain יָ֣ם <WH3220> yam sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <WH4417> ham-Me-lach, [even] the salt תַּ֛חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat the foot אַשְׁדֹּ֥ת <WH794> 'ash-Dot of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּ֖ה <WH6449> hap-pis-Gah of Pisgah מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah. eastward
